characters.description: See S06E23 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success and during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during At the Gala in The Best Night Ever, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and with cutie mark(s) visible during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Resembles Shoeshine, Screwy, and "Bloo" in color scheme.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during At the Gala in The Best Night Ever, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Resembles Rainbowshine, "Swirly Cotton", "Rainbow Drop", "Northern Lights", "Amethyst Beat", S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #3, Sweetsong, Star Dasher, and Bright Bridle in color scheme.

characters.name: S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: A pony which appears in top down shots during the first fashion show in Suited For Success, during the Smile Song in A Friend in Deed, and during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S02E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in the ceremony in The Return of Harmony Part 2. Has a similar color scheme to Cherry Berry. Her eye color and cutie mark are not shown.

characters.name: S02E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in the ceremony in The Return of Harmony Part 2. Has the same design as unicorn Twilight Sparkle, Sweetcream Scoops, and Lovestruck, the same tail style as Photo Finish and Moon Dancer, and a similar color scheme to Daisy and S04E20 Unnamed Pegasus Mare #1. Her eye color and cutie mark are not shown.

characters.name: S02E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears twice in one audience in Sisterhooves Social and Brotherhooves Social. Shares the same design and mane as Lemon Hearts and the same coat, eyes, and thunderstorm cutie mark as White Lightning.

characters.name: S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears during the pageant performance in Hearth's Warming Eve, at the home of the unicorns. She shares her design with Minuette, Sea Swirl, Peachy Pitt, Silver Spanner from the front, "Fuchsia Fizz", "The Inquisitor", "Perfect Timing", S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, "Red Rose", "Sunset Rain", "Passionate", S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and Issue 08 Unnamed Mare - Hourglass, and shares her coat and mane colors with Amethyst Star.

characters.name: S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears during the pageant performance in Hearth's Warming Eve, at the home of the unicorns. She resembles "Sugarberry", but her mane and tail are different, resembling those of Orange Swirl.

characters.name: S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears with her eyes closed during the pageant performance in Hearth's Warming Eve, following Princess Platinum into the summit of the tribes. Shares her design with Minuette, Sea Swirl, Peachy Pitt, Silver Spanner from the front, "Fuchsia Fizz", "The Inquisitor", "Perfect Timing", S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, "Red Rose", S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1, "Sunset Rain", "Passionate", and Issue 08 Unnamed Mare - Hourglass.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower along with Amethyst Star, Minuette, Sea Swirl, Twinkleshine, and other ponies in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2. Also appears in Triple Threat. Resembles Lyra Heartstrings.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower along with Amethyst Star, Minuette, Sea Swirl, Twinkleshine, and other ponies in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2. Also appears in Triple Threat. Resembles Lemon Hearts.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (front row, closest to door). Her color scheme resembles Scootaloo's. A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (front row, center). Her color scheme resembles "Dinky Doo's". A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (front row, farthest from door). Her color scheme resembles Shoeshine's. A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (back row, closest to door). Her color scheme resembles S01E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5's. A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (back row, center). Her color scheme resembles Goldengrape's. A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #8
characters.description: Appears as a hornblower in one shot in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 (back row, farthest from door). Her color scheme resembles Fluttershy's. A promotional image from The Hub's Facebook page shows her more clearly than the corresponding frame of the show does.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #9
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as Amethyst Star. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show her more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #11
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as Royal Ribbon. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show her more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #12
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as Amethyst Star. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show her more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do. Concurrently with G4, a G1 version of either her or Twilight Sparkle has been introduced in IDW Publishing's Transformers vs. G.I. Joe Issue #13.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as Dark Moon. Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show him more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do.

characters.name: S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears throughout crowds in A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2 and Magical Mystery Cure. Has the same design as "Ponet". Two promotional images from The Hub's Facebook page show him more clearly than the corresponding frames of the show do.

characters.name: S04E01 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 1. Has the same design and dress design as "Charm" and "Gold Slipper".

characters.name: S04E08 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Rarity Takes Manehattan, facing the line.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: A balloon vendor who appears during the song Pinkie the Party Planner in Pinkie Pride.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: A vendor who appears wearing glasses during the song Pinkie the Party Planner in Pinkie Pride. Shares her design with Minuette, Sea Swirl, Peachy Pitt, Silver Spanner from the front, "Fuchsia Fizz", "The Inquisitor", "Perfect Timing", S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, "Red Rose", S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1, "Sunset Rain", "Passionate", S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and Issue 08 Unnamed Mare - Hourglass.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Also appears in Equestria Games, The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, Parental Glideance, My Little Pony The Movie, and The Washouts. Shares her design and coat and eye colors with Twinkleshine and S05E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1, her design, eye color, and cutie mark with "Nook", her design with Lemon Hearts and Apple Stars, and her coat and eye colors with S09E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a green leaf.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: Appears during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Also appears in Parental Glideance, with a darker coat in My Little Pony The Movie, and in Yakity-Sax. Shares her design with Twinkleshine, Lemon Hearts, and Apple Stars.

characters.name: S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears at the pizza party during The Super Duper Party Pony in Pinkie Pride. Also appears with a yellow mane and tail in Equestria Games. Identical to Doctor Horse in all but mane and tail color and cutie mark, shares his design with S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, "Gary Coronet", and "Black Marble", shares his mane and tail style and coat and eye colors with Caramel, shares his mane and tail style with Cherry Fizzy, Royal Riff, and S01E02 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1, and resembles Sunburst. His cutie mark is an orange leaf.

characters.name: S04E20 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Leap of Faith and Equestria Games. Shares his design and eye color with Joe. His cutie mark is a scroll.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares her design and cutie mark with Minuette, "The Inquisitor", "Perfect Timing", "Red Rose", and Issue 08 Unnamed Mare - Hourglass, shares her design with Sea Swirl, Peachy Pitt, Silver Spanner from the front, "Fuchsia Fizz", S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2, S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1, "Sunset Rain", "Passionate", and S02E11 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and resembles "Spring Fresh". Her cutie mark is an hourglass.

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya! Shares his design with Doctor Horse, S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, "Gary Coronet", and "Black Marble".

characters.name: S04E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears at Rainbow Falls in Trade Ya!, voiced. Shares his design, eye color, and cutie mark design with Rare Find, and shares his design with "Written Script" and Comet Tail. His cutie mark is four red gems.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games, between pink-coated White Lightning and S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #2, in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, in Road to Friendship, in The Washouts, in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, and in The Summer Sun Setback. Shares her design with Twinkleshine, Lemon Hearts, Apple Stars, S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, and "Cloverbelle". Her cutie mark is three hearts.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares her design with S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6, and S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7, and shares her mane and tail style with Sweetie Drops, Shoeshine, Luckette, Grape Delight, Lilac Links, Sunny Smiles, and S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares her design with S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6, and S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7, and shares her mane and tail style with Sweetie Drops, Shoeshine, Luckette, Grape Delight, Lilac Links, Sunny Smiles, and S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares her design with S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5, and S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7, and shares her mane and tail style with Sweetie Drops, Shoeshine, Luckette, Grape Delight, Lilac Links, Sunny Smiles, and S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7
characters.description: Appears in Equestria Games. Shares her design with S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5, and S04E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6, and shares her mane and tail style with Sweetie Drops, Shoeshine, Luckette, Grape Delight, Lilac Links, Sunny Smiles, and S04E24 Unnamed Earth Mare #3.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears, at least sometimes cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1, The Cutie Map - Part 2, and a European magazine comic whose French title is Une leçon d'amitié.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1, The Cutie Map - Part 2, and Enterplay collectible card game Equestrian Odysseys expansion set card #179 C.

characters.name: S05E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears, cutie unmarked, in The Cutie Map - Part 1 and The Cutie Map - Part 2.

characters.name: S05E02 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Map - Part 2 and My Little Pony The Movie. Shares her design and coat and eye colors with Twinkleshine and S04E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4, her design and eye color with "Nook", her design with Lemon Hearts and Apple Stars, and her coat and eye colors with S09E13 Unnamed Earth Mare #1.

characters.name: S05E09 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Slice of Life when DJ Pon-3 and Octavia Melody race to town hall on a mobile DJ booth.

characters.name: S05E10 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: One of four polo-playing ponies in Princess Spike. Also appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, Spice Up Your Life, Parental Glideance, Yakity-Sax, The Washouts, and The Ending of the End - Part 1. Her cutie mark is three polo balls.

characters.name: S05E10 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: One of four polo-playing ponies in Princess Spike. Also appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1, Viva Las Pegasus, Parental Glideance, Yakity-Sax, The Washouts, The Point of No Return, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. His cutie mark is two crossed polo mallets.

characters.name:
Public Works Pony
S05E10 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears as a construction worker in Princess Spike. Shares his body type, mane and tail style, eye color, cutie mark, and construction equipment design with "Rivet" and his body type, mane and tail style, eye color, and construction equipment design with Hard Hat. Voiced by Peter New. He is a character called "Public Works Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "This pony knows pipefitting's never a snooze -- and is always on time with his union dues."

characters.name: S05E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears at the Canterlot library in Amending Fences and at Canterlot Carousel in Canterlot Boutique. Shares her design and eye color with Twinkleshine, her design with Lemon Hearts, and her tail style and rarely cutie mark with "Serena". Her cutie mark is a pineapple.

characters.name: S05E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears at the Canterlot library in Amending Fences and at Canterlot Carousel in Canterlot Boutique. Shares her design and eye color with Minuette, her design with Sea Swirl, and her cutie mark design with "Rocky Storm". Her cutie mark is pink cotton candy.

characters.name: S05E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in the restaurant in Amending Fences. Shares his mane and tail style, color scheme, and cutie mark with Tall Order and his coat and eye colors and cutie mark with Sealed Scroll. His cutie mark is a scroll.

characters.name: S05E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Canterlot Boutique wearing the Princess Dress. Shares her mane style and color with "Orange Sherbet".

characters.name: S05E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #7
characters.description: Appears in Canterlot Boutique wearing the Princess Dress. Shares her mane style and color with S04E08 Unnamed Earth Mare #10.

characters.name: S05E15 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Canterlot playing the trumpet in Rarity Investigates!

characters.name: S05E16 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in a photo album in Made in Manehattan. Her cutie mark is two plums.

characters.name: S05E24 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Mane Attraction as an attendee of the Helping Hooves Music Festival. Shares her design with Lyra Heartstrings.

characters.name: S05E25 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1 during Twilight Sparkle's Cutie Mark Magic lecture. Shares her mane design with Orange Swirl and Rainbowshine and has a similar color scheme to "Garden Grove".

characters.name: S05E25 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1 during Twilight Sparkle's Cutie Mark Magic lecture. Shares her mane design with Lily Valley, Cloud Kicker, and Merry May and has a similar design to Pisces and FIENDship is Magic 04 Unnamed Mare - Rainbow Star. Her cutie mark appears to be pink bubbles.

characters.name: S05E25 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1 during Twilight Sparkle's Cutie Mark Magic lecture, in Where the Apple Lies, in Parental Glideance, and in The Washouts. Resembles "Power Chord". Her cutie mark is three yellow flowers.

characters.name: S05E25 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1 during Twilight Sparkle's Cutie Mark Magic lecture, in No Second Prances, in Where the Apple Lies, in Parental Glideance, in Yakity-Sax, and in The Washouts. Her cutie mark is three violet hearts.

characters.name: S05E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 2 and The Crystalling - Part 1 as a resident of Sire's Hollow. Also appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, and The Last Problem. Resembles Kunzite from Sailor Moon. Shares his design and eye color with S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3 and his design with S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2. His cutie mark is a row of crystals.

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in On Your Marks having a bill signed by Mayor Mare. Her cutie mark is a light blue star.

characters.name: S06E04 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in On Your Marks having a bill signed by Mayor Mare.

characters.name: S06E06 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in No Second Prances. Shares her design, eye color, mane bow, and tail bow design with "Rainbow Stars". Her cutie mark is three candies/bows.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail during Hearth's Warming Eve Is Here Once Again. Her cutie mark is three hearts, two red and one pink.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". An Earth pony version appears in A Rockhoof and a Hard Place walking through Canterlot. Her cutie mark is three umbrellas.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail during Hearth's Warming Eve Is Here Once Again. His cutie mark is two ornaments.

characters.name: S06E08 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail during Hearth's Warming Eve Is Here Once Again. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 6. His cutie mark appears to be two light-blue clouds.

characters.name:
Distinguished Pony
S06E08 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in A Hearth's Warming Tail as a character in the story "A Hearth's Warming Tail". His cutie mark is an Erlenmeyer flask. He is a character called "Distinguished Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of him states, "Distinguished is right -- just look at that vest! As followers of fashion, we're VERY impressed."

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life. Shares her design and cutie mark with Amethyst Star, Lemony Gem, and Diamond Mint. Her cutie mark is three brilliant-cut gemstones.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a patron of the Tasty Treat restaurant. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and Growing Up is Hard to Do. Her appearance is based on American chef and television personality Julia Child, the same basis as Mulia Mild.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a restaurant waiter. Shares his design and cutie mark with S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #5, and S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a restaurant waiter. Shares his design and cutie mark with S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #5, and S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a restaurant waiter. Shares his design and cutie mark with S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #5, and S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #5
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a restaurant waiter. Shares his design and cutie mark with S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3, and S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a restaurant waiter. Shares his design and cutie mark with S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2, S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3, and S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #5.

characters.name:
Burly Unicorn
S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #9
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a patron at the Tasty Treat restaurant and owner of the Smoked Oat restaurant. Also appears in Between Dark and Dawn. His appearance is based on American celebrity chef Chris Cosentino. His cutie mark is sometimes a spatula and other times a mallet.

characters.name: S06E12 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #10
characters.description: Appears in Spice Up Your Life as a patron at the Tasty Treat restaurant. Also appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do. His cutie mark is a cooking pan. His appearance is based on American television chef Art Ginsburg.

characters.name: S06E13 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction managing a booth at the Daring Do Convention. Also appears in Viva Las Pegasus, Once Upon a Zeppelin, and Grannies Gone Wild. Shares her design with S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a blue spiral.

characters.name:
Wild Fan
S06E13 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Stranger Than Fan Fiction as an attendee of the Daring Do Convention cosplaying as S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #7. His cutie mark is a broom. He is a character called "Wild Fan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S06E17 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Dungeons & Discords as a drummer in a swing band. His cutie mark is two crossed drumsticks and three musical notes.

characters.name: S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Buckball Season trying out for the Ponyville buckball team. Shares his design and eye color with S09E17 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1 and his design with S08E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1. His cutie mark appears to be a red explosion.

characters.name: S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Buckball Season trying out for the Ponyville buckball team. Shares his design and eye color with S05E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2 and his design with S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2.

characters.name: S06E19 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Fault in Our Cutie Marks as a vocalist in Octavia Melody's quartet. Her cutie mark is a microphone. Shares her mane and tail with "Millie".

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort wearing a lampshade on her head. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark appears to be a cannon.

characters.name: S06E20 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #6
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Forgotten Friendship, Grannies Gone Wild, Friendship University, Between Dark and Dawn, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. Her cutie mark is a Ferris wheel.

characters.name:
Destitute Pony
S06E20 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus at Gladmane's Las Pegasus resort. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild, Friendship University, in which he has a speaking role, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 8. His cutie mark appears to be a green reversed alpha. Voiced by Nick Wolfhard.

characters.name:
Director
S06E20 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #6
characters.description: Appears in Viva Las Pegasus as a trapeze director in Ponet Fantastique. His cutie mark is a bullhorn. Voiced by Brian Drummond.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor/surgeon at the Ponyville Hospital. Her cutie mark is something with a heart on it.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor/surgeon at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies and A Flurry of Emotions as a janitor at the Ponyville Hospital. Somewhat resembles Stygian.

characters.name: S06E23 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4
characters.description: Appears in Where the Apple Lies as a doctor/surgeon at the Ponyville Hospital.

characters.name: S06E25 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in To Where and Back Again - Part 1. Shares his design with "Ponet", "Star Bright", "Poppycock", S02E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #4, and "Stage Tales", his mane and tail style with Royal Pin, and his color scheme with cutie unmarked S05E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3. His cutie mark is an acorn.

characters.name: S07E10 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Royal Problem as a Canterlot Castle maid.

characters.name: S07E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as an out-of-town pony from Fillydelphia getting Twilight Sparkle to autograph her copy of the published friendship journal. Either she or S07E14 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1 is not in Fame and Misfortune's locked script.

characters.name:
Out of Town Pony
S07E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as an out-of-town pony from Fillydelphia getting Twilight Sparkle to autograph his copy of the published friendship journal. His cutie mark is a crown. Voiced by Michael Dobson. Female in Fame and Misfortune's locked script. Jim Miller described Make-A-Wish Foundation character three, "He wasn’t in "Once Upon a Zeppelin". He was in Ep. 714 “Fame and Misfortune”. He’s one of the ponies who approaches TS to get an autograph who wants to keep it in a Mylar bag. He has blue hair. Doesn’t have any disloyal." See also Stellar Eclipse, Angel Wings, and Code Red; not to be confused with Star Tracker.

characters.name: S07E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as an out-of-town pony from Fillydelphia getting Twilight Sparkle to autograph his copy of the published friendship journal. His cutie mark is a typewriter. Fame and Misfortune's scripts list his dialogue within walla.

characters.name:
Reporter Pony
S07E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Fame and Misfortune as a reporter for the Canterlot Chronicle. Also appears in The Last Crusade and The Ending of the End - Part 2. His cutie mark is a pencil inside a text bubble. Voiced by Peter New in Fame and Misfortune and Kyle Rideout in The Ending of the End - Part 2.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Mistmane's village in Rarity's story. Shares her design with "Ramal Kthyb".

characters.name:
Imperial Alchemist Pony
S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a student at Mistmane's magic school. She is a character called "Imperial Alchemist Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Villager
S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a resident of Mistmane's village in Rarity's story. Voiced by Paul Dobson.

characters.name: S07E16 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in Campfire Tales as a student at Mistmane's magic school. Shares his body style and eyebrows with Biff, "Quick Trim", S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #8, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #5, S04E04 Unnamed Earth Stallion #2, and S05E25 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1.

characters.name:
Quiet Somnambulan
S07E18 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. She is a character called "Quiet Somnambulan" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: S07E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Daring Done? as a resident of Somnambula. Also appears in Road to Friendship and A Rockhoof and a Hard Place. Shares his design and eye color with "Slate Sentiments".

characters.name: S07E19 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You with a mane inspired by Rarity's look in Vanity Mare magazine. Her cutie mark is a bullhorn.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a passenger on Iron Will's Cruise of the Princesses Experience. Also appears in Grannies Gone Wild and Between Dark and Dawn. His cutie mark is a can of spray paint.

characters.name: S07E22 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in Once Upon a Zeppelin as a steward on Iron Will's zeppelin. Also appears in Uncommon Bond. His cutie mark is a steam whistle.

characters.name: S07E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in flashback in Shadow Play - Part 2 during the Sirens' attack on a village in the Hollow Shades.

characters.name: S08E01 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in School Daze - Part 1 and a Signature My Little Pony magazine issue 100 sticker as a board member of the Equestria Education Assocation. Shares her body design partly with Chancellor Puddinghead, "Stärke Kragen", and "Roar Horn" and partly with Prim Hemline, Stormy Flare, "Greenhoof Hooffield", "Betsey Trotson", "Clarity Cut", "Candy Curls", S07E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #1, Professor Fossil, Old Money, and S09E19 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1.

characters.name:
Grim EEA Official
S08E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in School Daze - Part 1 as a board member of the Equestria Education Assocation. Shares his design with S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1 and his body design with Professor Flintheart. He is a character called "Grim EEA Official" in Gameloft's mobile game, and he serves as an enemy minion during the School Raze and The Last Problem-based events. His bio states, "No, this pony does NOT teach potion classes -- he sets the curriculum guidelines for potion classes! Why won't ponies stop asking him that?!"

characters.name: S08E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Grannies Gone Wild as a ticket pony for the Wild Blue Yonder rollercoaster. Shares his design with S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2 and S09E17 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1 and his cutie mark with S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. His cutie mark is a crescent moon and three white stars.

characters.name: S08E08 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a resident of Sire's Hollow. His cutie mark is an anchor.

characters.name: S08E09 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Non-Compete Clause as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design, eye color, and cutie mark with "Mulberry Flowers", her mane and tail style with "Moonlight Raven", and her eyes nearly with Twilight Sparkle. Her cutie mark is a bunch of purple flowers.

characters.name:
Magenta Townspony
S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, The Hearth's Warming Club, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, A Horse Shoe-In, Growing Up is Hard to Do, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with S06E13 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1. Her cutie mark is three yellow hexagonal objects. She is a character called "Magenta Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states, "Some ponies have compared her tail to a cinnamon bun! She's not really offended by that, though, because really: who doesn't like cinnamon buns?"

characters.name:
Neat-Maned Townspony
S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, The Hearth's Warming Club, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, 2, 4, 6, Greaaat, A Horse Shoe-In, and The Ending of the End - Part 1 as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with "Citrus Blush" and her cutie mark with S08E08 Unnamed Earth Stallion #1. Her cutie mark is a sunflower. She is a character named "Neat-Maned Townspony" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states "Not much to add here, if we're honest--but we really dig the way she does her bangs!"

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Trivial Pursuit, Dragon Dropped, A Horse Shoe-In, The Last Problem, and Rarity's Biggest Fan as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his body design with "Desert Wind", S07E22 Unnamed Pegasus Stallion #3, and "End Zone". His cutie mark is two square tile-like objects.

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 1, School Raze - Part 2, My Little Pony Best Gift Ever, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Horse Shoe-In, and The Ending of the End - Part 2 as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design with "Polo Play". His cutie mark is a wrench.

characters.name: S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3
characters.description: Appears in A Matter of Principals, A Rockhoof and a Hard Place, School Raze - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 2, She's All Yak, A Trivial Pursuit, Dragon Dropped, A Horse Shoe-In, Growing Up is Hard to Do, and The Last Problem as a student at the School of Friendship. Shares his design with "Crimson Heart" and "Spellbound". His cutie mark is a fried egg.

characters.name:
Round Pony
S08E19 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Road to Friendship as an innkeeper in Somnambula. She is a character named "Brusque Innkeeper" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her bio states, "She takes reservations REALLY far in advance--especially for holidays. Make sure you get in touch with her at least three months early!" Voiced by Kelly Sheridan.

characters.name:
Stepford Pony 1
S08E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in What Lies Beneath in a manifestation of Smolder's fears. Resembles Raspberry Beret. Voiced by Lauren Jackson.

characters.name:
Librarian Pony
S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return as the head librarian of Canterlot Library. Her cutie mark is three red bell flowers. Voiced by Tabitha St. Germain.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at the Canterlot Library and The Tasty Treat. Also appears in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat on the School of Magic buckball team. Her cutie mark is a cluster of blue crystals.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at the Canterlot Library. Also appears in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat on the School of Magic buckball team and in The Last Problem. Her cutie mark is a red sunflower.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #4
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at the Canterlot Library. Also appears in 2, 4, 6, Greaaat on the School of Magic buckball team. Her cutie mark is a pink five-pointed star and five purple teardrops around it.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #5
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at The Tasty Treat. Also appears in The Summer Sun Setback and The Last Problem. Shares her body design with "Lavender Sunrise" and S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #4 Her cutie mark is three stars and a crescent moon.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at The Tasty Treat. Shares his design with "November Rain". His cutie mark is a flower.

characters.name: S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Point of No Return at The Tasty Treat. Also appears in The Summer Sun Setback and The Last Problem. Shares his design with S05E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2 and S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #3.

characters.name: S09E06 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in Common Ground competing in the Appleloosa buckball tournament. His cutie mark is a circular saw.

characters.name: S09E13 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Between Dark and Dawn. Resembles Elphaba in Wicked.

characters.name: S09E13 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in Between Dark and Dawn. Resembles Galinda in Wicked.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name: S09E14 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Laugh as a worker at Cheese Sandwich's Amusement Factory.

characters.name:
Unicorn 1
S09E17 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: A member of the Flaming Sky Firework Troupe in The Summer Sun Setback. Shares her design and eye color with "Burning Heart" and "Lipstick Vanity". Voiced by Andrea Libman.

characters.name: S09E17 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: A member of the Flaming Sky Firework Troupe in The Summer Sun Setback. Shares his design and eye color with S06E18 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2 and his design with S08E05 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1.

characters.name: S09E19 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Dragon Dropped as a Ponyville fabric store owner. Shares her body design with Prim Hemline, Stormy Flare, "Greenhoof Hooffield", "Betsey Trotson", "Clarity Cut", "Candy Curls", S07E20 Unnamed Earth Mare #1, Professor Fossil, Old Money, and partly S08E01 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1. Her cutie mark is two sewing needles and a ball of orange yarn.

characters.name: S09E22 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in Growing Up is Hard to Do during Being Big is All It Takes. Shares her design with "Sprout Greenhoof".

characters.name:
Unicorn Baker
S09E24 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: A Canterlot Castle baker in The Ending of the End - Part 1. Shares his color scheme with Comet Tail. His cutie mark is a roll of bread. Voiced by Matt Cowlrick.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot. Shares her design with Sunshine Smiles and her mane and tail design with "Strawberry Scoop".

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot. Shares her design mostly with "Citrus Blush" and S08E14 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #2 and slightly with S09E05 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Mare #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem shopping at future Carousel Boutique. Shares her body design with "Raspberry Vinaigrette" and S08E14 Unnamed Earth Mare #1. Her cutie mark is a green fan.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as one of Twilight Sparkle's future royal aides. Shares his design with S08E01 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #1 and his body design with Professor Flintheart.

characters.name:
Coifed Waiter Pony
S09E26 Unnamed Unicorn Stallion #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as one of the food servers at Twilight's coronation ceremony. He is a character named "Coiffed Waiter Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game, and serves as a boss battle helper during the "Royal Dining: Entrée" event. His in-game description states "When asked how he was going to style his mane for the coronation banquet, he just said 'a lot.'"
